mapper.insert: insert into waiting (waitingNumber, waitingCustomerNumber, waitingPhone, waitingPeople, waitingDate, waitingAvailable, memberNumber) values (#{waitingNumber}, #{waitingCustomerNumber}, #{waitingPhone}, #{waitingPeople}, #{waitingDate}, #{waitingAvailable}, #{memberNumber})
mapper.select: select * from waiting where waitingAvailable = #{waitingAvailable} and memberNumber = #{memberNumber}
select * from waiting, member where waiting.memberNumber = #{memberNumber} and member.memberNumber = #{memberNumber} and waitingDate like #{waitingDate}
mapper.update: update waiting set waitingAvailable = #{waitingAvailable} where waitingNumber = #{waitingNumber} and waitingAvailable = #{waitingAvailable}
